subject: p15776774
Findings: In comparison with study of, the patient has taken a better inspiration. Cardiac silhouette is within normal limits and there is no evidence of vascular congestion or pleural effusion. No acute pneumonia. Multiple old healed rib fractures are seen. There again are calcified hilar and mediastinal lymph nodes, compatible with the sequela of known sarcoidosis.
